root: ^The metal detector is picking up on something.
^[You threw your metal detector and started digging in the designated spot]
^[Something shing unveils itself onto you, could it possibly be what you were looking for?]
^Of all things to be thrown away into the ocean.
^It might not be much, but it should definitely be worth something.
^Gotta get this back to Umi Village.
^The praise I’ll get for this, it’ll be so worth it.
